channel.title: List of Graduates of Faculty of Fine Arts BUT for year 2022 on Diplomantky.cz
channel.description: Recent content in List of Graduates of Faculty of Fine Arts BUT for year 2022 on Diplomantky.cz

item.title: Adéla Venturová
item.description: A new being has been created in the Studio of Body Design from an organic body and several found synthetic materials. This being thinks ecofeministically, but at the same time is aware that it arose from pollution and the material affluence of a post-capitalist society. It has appeared at three locations and in three states. First at the Rainbow Gallery in Prostějov, then in the Polish town of Zakopane in the Wladyslaw Hasior Gallery and finally at the Kruhovka festival in Vrbová in Slovakia.
